title: docs: mention escaping of '&' in json.Marshal()
body:
by **kkowalczyk**: 
The docs for json.Marshal() mention non-standard escaping of '<' and '>'
characters but it's also done for '&' character and that's not documented.

Similarly, comments in encoding/json/encode.go in func (e *encodeState) string(s string)
and func (e *encodeState) stringBytes(s []byte) for default: case mention < and >
but not &.
